description.english: Dived a total distance of 2000 metres.
description.german: Du bist insgesamt 2000 Meter weit getaucht.
description.french: Vous avez cumulé 2000 m de plongeons.
description.italian: Hai nuotato per una distanza pari a 2000 metri.
description.spanish: Bucea una distancia total de 2000 metros.
description.polish: Za przepłynięcie łącznie 2000 metrów pod wodą.
description.brazilian: Mergulhou uma distância total de 2.000 metros.

description.english: You looked at all interactibles in Gollum's cave.
description.german: Du hast dir alle interaktiven Gegenstände in Gollums Höhle angesehen.
description.french: Vous avez examiné tous les points d'intérêt de la caverne de Gollum.
description.italian: Hai esaminato tutti gli oggetti interattivi nella caverna di Gollum.
description.koreana: 골룸의 동굴 안에 있는 상호작용을 전부 확인했습니다.
description.spanish: Has observado todos los elementos interactuables de la cueva de Gollum.
description.schinese: 查看咕噜洞穴内的所有互动项。
description.tchinese: 查看咕嚕洞穴內的所有互動項。
description.russian: Открыты все интерактивные элементы в пещере Голлума.
description.japanese: ゴラムの洞窟で調べられるものを全て調べた
description.polish: Za obejrzenie wszystkiego, co się da, w jaskini Golluma.
description.turkish: Gollum'un mağarasındaki bütün etkileşilebilir nesnelere baktın.
description.brazilian: Você conferiu tudo que havia de interativo na caverna do Gollum.

displayName.japanese: モルドールへようこそ！

description.english: You've died for the first time in Barad-dûr.
description.german: Du bist das erste Mal in Barad-dûr gestorben.
description.french: Vous êtes mort pour la première fois dans Barad-dûr.
description.italian: Sei morto per la prima volta a Barad-dûr.
description.spanish: Has muerto por primera vez en Barad-dûr.
description.schinese: 第一次在巴拉督尔丧命。
description.tchinese: 第一次在巴拉督爾喪命。
description.japanese: バラド＝ドゥーアで初めて死んだ
description.polish: Za zginięcie po raz pierwszy w Barad-dûrze.
description.brazilian: Você morreu pela primeira vez em Barad-dûr.

description.french: Un poisson et des arêtes, si doux, si juteux !
description.koreana: 참 달고 즙 많은 물고기 하나 잡는 것!
description.spanish: ¡Que atrapemos un pez jugoso y suculento!
description.schinese: …抓住一条鱼，肥美又多汁的鱼。
description.tchinese: …抓住一條魚，肥美又多汁的魚。
description.polish: A dla nas chyba jakaś by ryba połaskotała gardziele.

displayName.english: We wants it! We needs it
displayName.german: Wir wollen ihn! Wir brauchen ihn!
displayName.french: On le veusse ! On le veusse !
displayName.schinese: 我们想要它！我们需要它！
displayName.tchinese: 我們想要它！我們需要它！
displayName.russian: Мы хотим ее! Она нужна нам!
displayName.japanese: ほしい！それが欲しいのよ！

description.french: Tous les choix en faveur de Gollum.
description.spanish: Todas las elecciones fueron de Gollum.

displayName.japanese: スメアゴルいいヤツよ！

description.french: Tous les choix en faveur de Sméagol.
description.spanish: Todas las elecciones fueron de Sméagol.
description.japanese: 全てがスメアゴルの選択

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 1.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 1.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 2.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 2.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 3.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 3.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 4.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 4.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 5.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 5.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 6.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 6.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 7.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 7.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 8.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 8.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 9.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 9.

description.french: Vous avez terminé le Chapitre 10.
description.spanish: Has completado el capítulo 10.

description.english: You got the Grashneg trampled, drowned, and eaten.
description.german: Du hast den Grashneg zertrampelt, ertränkt und zum Fraß vorgeworfen.
description.french: Le Grashneg est mort piétiné, noyé et dévoré.
description.italian: Hai fatto calpestare, annegare e divorare il Grashneg.
description.koreana: 그라쉬넥이 짓밟히고, 물에 빠져 죽고, 잡아먹혔습니다.
description.spanish: Has pisoteado, ahogado y usado al grashneg como alimento.
description.schinese: 让格拉斯涅格被踩死、淹死和吃掉。
description.tchinese: 讓格拉斯涅格被踩死、淹死和吃掉。
description.japanese: グラシュニクが踏まれ、溺れ、食われた
description.polish: Grashneg został stratowany, zjedzony i utonął.
description.brazilian: Você fez com que o Grashneg se afogasse, fosse pisoteado e devorado.

description.french: Un objet de collection trouvé.
description.spanish: Un objeto coleccionable menos.

description.french: Vous avez trouvé 20 objets de collection.
description.spanish: Has reunido 20 objetos coleccionables.

description.english: Well done. You found all those useless things.
description.german: Gut gemacht! Du hast all diese nutzlosen Dinge gefunden.
description.french: Bravo ! Vous avez trouvé tous les machins inutiles.
description.italian: Ben fatto. Hai trovato tutti questi oggetti inutili.
description.koreana: 잘하셨습니다. 쓸모 없는 것들을 전부 모았습니다.
description.spanish: Buen trabajo. Has encontrado todas esas cosas inútiles.
description.schinese: 干得好。所有没用的东西都被你找到了。
description.tchinese: 幹得好。所有沒用的東西都被你找到了。
description.russian: Отлично. Вы собрали все эти бесполезные вещи.
description.japanese: お疲れ様。無駄な物を全部見つけたね
description.polish: Dobra robota. Masz wszystkie nieprzydatne przedmioty.
description.brazilian: Parabéns. Você encontrou todas aquelas coisas inúteis.

description.french: Vous avez lancé 50 pierres.
description.spanish: Has lanzado 50 piedras.

description.english: You stole food from Mell's table.
description.german: Du hast Essen von Mells Tisch gestohlen.
description.french: Vous avez volé de la nourriture sur la table de Mell.
description.italian: Hai rubato del cibo dal tavolo di Mell.
description.spanish: Has robado comida de la mesa de Mell.
description.schinese: 偷走梅尔桌子上的食物。
description.tchinese: 偷走梅爾桌子上的食物。
description.russian: Вы стащили еду со стола Мелл.
description.japanese: メルのテーブルから食べ物を盗んだ
description.polish: Udało ci się ukraść jedzenie ze stołu Mell.
description.brazilian: Você roubou comida da mesa da Mell.

description.english: You completed the “Halls of Grond” without taking damage.
description.german: Du hast „Die Hallen Gronds“ abgeschlossen, ohne Schaden zu nehmen.
description.french: Vous avez terminé les « Salles de Grond » sans subir de dégâts.
description.italian: Hai completato le «Sale del Grond» senza subire danno.
description.spanish: Has completado las «Salas de Grond» sin sufrir daños.
description.schinese: 成功在不受伤的情况下完成“葛龙得大厅”。
description.tchinese: 成功在不受傷的情況下完成“葛龍得大廳”。
description.russian: Вы завершили «Чертоги Гронда», не получив урона.
description.japanese: 「グロンドの広間」をダメージを受けずにクリアした
description.brazilian: Você concluiu os Salões de Grond sem sofrer dano.

description.english: You found all food items at the bell tower.
description.german: Du hast alles Essbare im Glockenturm gefunden.
description.french: Vous avez trouvé toute la nourriture dans le clocher.
description.italian: Hai trovato tutti gli oggetti commestibili nel campanile.
description.koreana: 종탑에 있는 음식 아이템을 전부 찾았습니다.
description.spanish: Has encontrado todos los alimentos en el campanario.
description.schinese: 成功找到钟塔里的所有食物。
description.tchinese: 成功找到鐘塔里的所有食物。
description.russian: Вы нашли все съедобные предметы в колокольне.
description.japanese: 鐘楼にある食べ物を全て見つけた
description.polish: Udało ci się odnaleźć całe jedzenie w dzwonnicy.
description.turkish: Çan kulesindeki bütün yenebilir eşyaları buldun.
description.brazilian: Você encontrou toda a comida no campanário.

description.french: Éteignez 10 lanternes.
description.spanish: Apaga 10 faroles.

description.english: You rang all the bells at the bell tower.
description.german: Du hast alle Glocken im Glockenturm geläutet.
description.french: Vous avez fait sonner toutes les cloches du clocher.
description.italian: Hai suonato tutte le campane del Campanile.
description.spanish: Has hecho sonar todas las campanas del campanario.
description.russian: Вы позвонили во все колокола на колокольне.
description.japanese: 鐘楼の鐘を全て鳴らした
description.polish: Za zagranie na wszystkich dzwonach dzwonnicy.
description.brazilian: Você tocou todos os sinos no campanário.

description.french: Vous avez tué 10 Orques.
description.spanish: Has matado a 10 orcos.

description.french: Vous avez découvert tous les points d'observation.
description.italian: Hai scoperto tutti i punti di osservazione.
description.spanish: Has descubierto todas las posiciones elevadas.
description.schinese: 成功找出全部有利位置。
description.tchinese: 成功找出全部有利位置。
description.japanese: 景観ポイントを全て発見した
description.brazilian: Você descobriu todas as posições favoráveis.

description.german: Du bist in die Lava gefallen.
description.french: Vous êtes tombé dans la lave.
description.spanish: Te has caído a la lava.

description.english: You fell for a distance of 40 meters and survived.
description.german: Du bist 40 Meter tief gefallen und hast überlebt.
description.french: Vous avez fait une chute de 40 m et vous avez survécu.
description.italian: Sei caduto per oltre 40 metri e sei sopravvissuto.
description.spanish: Has caído una distancia de 40 metros y has sobrevivido.
description.russian: Падая, вы пролетели 40 метров и выжили.
description.japanese: 40メートルの距離を落下し生き残った
description.turkish: 40 metre yükseklikten düştün ve hayatta kaldın.
description.brazilian: Você sofreu uma queda de 40 metros e sobreviveu.

description.english: You completed the game without dying.
description.german: Du hast das Spiel beendet, ohne zu sterben.
description.french: Vous avez terminé le jeu sans mourir !
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco senza morire.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego sin morir.
description.schinese: 成功在不死亡的情况下通关了游戏。
description.tchinese: 成功在不死亡的情況下通關了遊戲。
description.russian: Вы завершили игру, ни разу не погибнув.
description.japanese: 死なずにゲームをクリアした
description.brazilian: Você terminou o jogo sem morrer.

description.english: You saved the Cook, the Elf guards, and the Riddlemaster.
description.german: Du hast den Koch, die Elbenwächter und den Rätselmeister gerettet.
description.french: Vous avez sauvé la cuisinière, les gardes et le Maître des Énigmes.
description.italian: Hai salvato la cuoca, le guardie elfiche e l'Enigmista.
description.koreana: 요리사, 요정 경비병, 수수께끼의 대가를 구했습니다.
description.spanish: Has salvado a la cocinera, a los guardias elfos y al Amo de los Acertijos.
description.schinese: 成功拯救厨子、精灵守卫和谜语大师。
description.tchinese: 成功拯救廚子、精靈守衛和謎語大師。
description.russian: Вы спасли повариху, эльфов-стражей и Мастера загадок.
description.japanese: 料理人、エルフの衛兵、なぞなぞ博士を助けた
description.polish: Za ocalenie kucharki, elfich strażników i mistrza zagadek.
description.turkish: Aşçıyı, elf muhafızlarını ve Bilmece Ustası'nı kurtardın.
description.brazilian: Você salvou a cozinheira, os guardas Elfos e o Mestre das Charadas.

description.english: The Cook, the Elf guards, and the Riddlemaster all died.
description.german: Der Koch, die Elbenwächter und der Rätselmeister sind alle tot.
description.french: La cuisinière, les gardes et le Maître des Énigmes sont tous morts.
description.italian: La cuoca, le guardie elfiche e l'Enigmista sono morti.
description.koreana: 요리사, 요정 경비병, 수수께끼의 대가가 전부 사망했습니다.
description.spanish: La cocinera, los guardias elfos y el Amo de los Acertijos han muerto.
description.schinese: 厨子、精灵守卫和谜语大师全部死亡。
description.tchinese: 廚子、精靈守衛和謎語大師全部死亡。
description.russian: Повариха, эльфы-стражи и Мастер загадок - все погибли.
description.japanese: 料理人、エルフの衛兵、なぞなぞ博士が死亡した
description.polish: Kucharka, elfi strażnicy i mistrz zagadek zginęli.
description.turkish: Aşçı, elf muhafızlar ve Bilmece Ustası öldü.
description.brazilian: A cozinheira, os guardas Elfos e o Mestre das Charadas morreram.

description.english: You played the entire riddle game with Mell.
description.german: Du hast das ganze Rätselspiel mit Mell gespielt.
description.french: Vous avez joué aux devinettes jusqu'au bout avec Mell.
description.italian: Hai completato il gioco degli indovinelli con Mell.
description.spanish: Has disfrutado en su totalidad del juego de acertijos con Mell.
description.schinese: 跟梅尔完成所有猜谜游戏。
description.tchinese: 跟梅爾完成所有猜謎遊戲。
description.russian: Вы прошли всю игру в загадки с Мелл.
description.japanese: メルと全てのなぞなぞをした
description.polish: Za rozegranie z Mell całej gry w zagadki.
description.turkish: Mell ile tüm bilmece oyununu oynadın.
description.brazilian: Você participou do jogo inteiro de charadas com a Mell.

description.english: You turned Riddlemaster's painting seven times.
description.german: Du hast das Bild des Rätselmeisters sieben Mal umgedreht.
description.french: Vous avez retourné 7 fois le tableau du Maître des Énigmes.
description.italian: Hai girato il ritratto dell'Enigmista per sette volte.
description.spanish: Le has dado la vuelta al cuadro del Amo de los Acertijos siete veces.
description.schinese: 改变谜语大师的画作七次。
description.tchinese: 改變謎語大師的畫作七次。
description.russian: Вы перевернули картину Мастера загадок семь раз.
description.japanese: なぞなぞ博士の絵を7回回した
description.turkish: Bilmece Ustası'nın resmini yedi kez döndürdün.
description.brazilian: Você virou a pintura do Mestre das Charadas sete vezes.

description.english: You jumped from the bell towers at the waterfalls three times.
description.german: Du bist dreimal von den Glockentürmen bei den Wasserfällen gesprungen.
description.french: Vous avez sauté trois fois du haut des clochers des chutes d'eau.
description.italian: Sei saltato dalle torri delle cascate per tre volte.
description.spanish: Has saltado tres veces a las cataratas desde los campanarios.
description.russian: Вы спрыгнули с колокольни у водопадов три раза.
description.japanese: 滝にある鐘楼から3回飛び降りた
description.polish: Za trzy skoki z dzwonnic przy wodospadzie.
description.turkish: Şelalelerin oradaki çan kulesinden üç defa atladın.
description.brazilian: Você pulou três vezes dos campanários nas cascatas.

description.french: Vous avez déverrouillé tous les succès.
description.spanish: Has desbloqueado todos los logros.
